verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֑ם <WH120> 'a-Dam; of man שְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> she-Ta-yim there were two נָשִׁ֔ים <WH802> na-Shim, women בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> be-Not the daughters אֵם־ <WH517> 'em- mother אַחַ֖ת <WH259> 'a-Chat of one הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> ha-Yu. become

וַתִּזְנֶ֣ינָה <WH2181> vat-tiz-Nei-nah And they committed whoredoms בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> ve-mitz-Ra-yim, in Egypt בִּנְעוּרֵיהֶ֖ן <WH5271> bin-'u-rei-Hen in their youth זָנ֑וּ <WH2181> za-Nu; they committed whoredoms שָׁ֚מָּה <WH8033> mah there מֹעֲכ֣וּ <WH4600> mo-'a-Chu pressed שְׁדֵיהֶ֔ן <WH7699> she-dei-Hen, there were their breasts וְשָׁ֣ם <WH8033> ve-Sham and there עִשּׂ֔וּ <WH6213> 'is-Su, and there they bruised דַּדֵּ֖י <WH1717> dad-Dei the teats בְּתוּלֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH1331> be-tu-lei-Hen. of their virginity

וּשְׁמוֹתָ֗ן <WH8034> u-she-mo-Tan, And the names אָהֳלָ֤ה <WH170> 'o-ho-Lah of them [were] Aholah הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lah the elder וְאָהֳלִיבָ֣ה <WH172> ve-'o-ho-li-Vah and Aholibah אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <WH269> a-cho-Tah, her sister וַתִּֽהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> vat-tih-Yei-nah became לִ֔י Li, וַתֵּלַ֖דְנָה <WH3205> vat-te-Lad-nah and they were mine and they bare בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבָנ֑וֹת <WH1323> u-va-Not; and daughters וּשְׁמוֹתָ֕ן <WH8034> u-she-mo-Tan Thus [were] their names שֹׁמְר֣וֹן <WH8111> sho-me-Ron Samaria אָהֳלָ֔ה <WH170> 'o-ho-Lah, [is] Aholah וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim and Jerusalem אָהֳלִיבָֽה׃ <WH172> 'o-ho-li-Vah. Aholibah

וַתִּ֥זֶן <WH2181> vat-Ti-zen played the harlot אָהֳלָ֖ה <WH170> 'o-ho-Lah And Aholah תַּחְתָּ֑י <WH8478> tach-Tai; when she was mine וַתַּעְגַּב֙ <WH5689> vat-ta'-Gav and she doted עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- after מְאַהֲבֶ֔יהָ <WH157> me-'a-ha-Vei-ha, on her lovers אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- after אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> 'ash-Shur on the Assyrians קְרוֹבִֽים׃ <WH7138> ke-ro-Vim. [her] neighbours

לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <WH3847> le-vu-Shei [Which were] clothed תְכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> te-Che-let with blue פַּח֣וֹת <WH6346> pa-Chot captains וּסְגָנִ֔ים <WH5461> u-se-ga-Nim, and rulers בַּח֥וּרֵי <WH970> ba-Chu-rei young men חֶ֖מֶד <WH2531> Che-med all of them desirable כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> kul-Lam; all פָּרָשִׁ֕ים <WH6571> pa-ra-Shim horsemen רֹכְבֵ֖י <WH7392> ro-che-Vei riding סוּסִֽים׃ <WH5483> su-Sim. upon horses

וַתִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> vat-tit-Ten Thus she committed תַּזְנוּתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH8457> taz-nu-Tei-ha her whoredoms עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, them מִבְחַ֥ר <WH4005> miv-Char with them with all them [that were] the chosen בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- men אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> 'ash-Shur of Assyria כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> kul-Lam; all וּבְכֹ֧ל <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom עָֽגְבָ֛ה <WH5689> 'a-ge-Vah and with all on whom she doted בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all גִּלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> gil-lu-lei-Hem with all their idols נִטְמָֽאָה׃ <WH2930> nit-Ma-'ah. she defiled

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תַּזְנוּתֶ֤יהָ <WH8457> taz-nu-Tei-ha she her whoredoms מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim [brought] from Egypt לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo did not עָזָ֔בָה <WH5800> 'a-Za-vah, Neither left כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH854> o-Tah for שָׁכְב֣וּ <WH7901> sha-che-Vu they lay בִנְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <WH5271> vin-'u-Rei-ha, for in her youth וְהֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah like עִשּׂ֖וּ <WH6213> 'is-Su with her and they bruised דַּדֵּ֣י <WH1717> dad-Dei the breasts בְתוּלֶ֑יהָ <WH1331> ve-tu-Lei-ha; of her virginity וַיִּשְׁפְּכ֥וּ <WH8210> vai-yish-pe-Chu and poured תַזְנוּתָ֖ם <WH8457> taz-nu-Tam their whoredom עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha. and

לָכֵ֥ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore נְתַתִּ֖יהָ <WH5414> ne-tat-Ti-ha Wherefore I have delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- her into the hand מְאַֽהֲבֶ֑יהָ <WH157> me-'a-ha-Vei-ha; of her lovers בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> be-Yad into the hand בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei afflicted אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> 'ash-Shur, Asshur אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom עָגְבָ֖ה <WH5689> 'a-ge-Vah upon whom she doted עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem. after

הֵמָּה֮ <WH1992> hem-Mah They גִּלּ֣וּ <WH1540> gil-Lu These discovered עֶרְוָתָהּ֒ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah her nakedness בָּנֶ֤יהָ <WH1121> ba-Nei-ha her sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha and her daughters לָקָ֔חוּ <WH3947> la-Ka-chu, they took וְאוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> ve-'o-Tah בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev her with the sword הָרָ֑גוּ <WH2026> ha-Ra-gu; and slew וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> vat-te-hi- became שֵׁם֙ <WH8034> shem and she became famous לַנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> lan-na-Shim, among women וּשְׁפוּטִ֖ים <WH8196> u-she-fu-Tim judgment עָ֥שׂוּ <WH6213> 'A-su for they had executed בָֽהּ׃ Vah. ס sa-Mek

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> vat-Te-re saw אֲחוֹתָ֣הּ <WH269> a-cho-Tah And when her sister אָהֳלִיבָ֔ה <WH172> 'o-ho-li-Vah, Aholibah וַתַּשְׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> vat-tash-Chet [this] she was more corrupt עַגְבָתָ֖הּ <WH5691> 'ag-va-Tah in her inordinate love מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah; was more וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תַּ֨זְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <WH8457> taz-nu-Tei-ha, than she and in her whoredoms מִזְּנוּנֵ֖י <WH2183> miz-ze-nu-Nei in [her] whoredoms אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> a-cho-Tah. more than her sister

אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- after בְּנֵי֩ <WH1121> be-Nei afflicted אַשּׁ֨וּר <WH804> 'ash-Shur Asshur עָגָ֜בָה <WH5689> 'a-Ga-vah She doted פַּח֨וֹת <WH6346> pa-Chot captains וּסְגָנִ֤ים <WH5461> u-se-ga-Nim and rulers קְרֹבִים֙ <WH7138> ke-ro-Vim [her] neighbours לְבֻשֵׁ֣י <WH3847> le-vu-Shei clothed מִכְל֔וֹל <WH4358> mich-Lol, most gorgeously פָּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> pa-ra-Shim horsemen רֹכְבֵ֣י <WH7392> ro-che-Vei riding סוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> su-Sim; upon horses בַּח֥וּרֵי <WH970> ba-Chu-rei young men חֶ֖מֶד <WH2531> Che-med all of them desirable כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> kul-Lam. all

וָאֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> va-'E-re Then I saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for נִטְמָ֑אָה <WH2930> nit-Ma-'ah; that she was defiled דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech way אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one לִשְׁתֵּיהֶֽן׃ <WH8147> lish-tei-Hen. [that] they [took] both

וַתּ֖וֹסֶף <WH3254> vat-To-sef And [that] she increased אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <WH8457> taz-nu-Tei-ha; her whoredoms וַתֵּ֗רֶא <WH7200> vat-Te-re, for when she saw אַנְשֵׁי֙ <WH376> 'an-Shei men מְחֻקֶּ֣ה <WH2707> me-chuk-Keh pourtrayed עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַקִּ֔יר <WH7023> hak-Kir, upon the wall צַלְמֵ֣י <WH6754> tzal-Mei the images; כַשְׂדִּיִּים chas-di-yim ככַשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> chas-Dim, Chaldeans קחֲקֻקִ֖ים <WH2710> cha-ku-Kim pourtrayed בַּשָּׁשַֽׁר׃ <WH8350> bash-sha-Shar. with vermilion

חֲגוֹרֵ֨י <WH2289> cha-go-Rei Girded אֵז֜וֹר <WH232> e-Zor with girdles בְּמָתְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4975> be-ma-te-nei-Hem, upon their loins סְרוּחֵ֤י <WH5628> se-ru-Chei exceeding טְבוּלִים֙ <WH2871> te-vu-Lim in dyed attire בְּרָ֣אשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH7218> be-Ra-shei-Hem, upon their heads מַרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> mar-'Eh to look to שָׁלִשִׁ֖ים <WH7991> sha-li-Shim all of them princes כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> kul-Lam; all דְּמ֤וּת <WH1823> de-Mut after the manner בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- afflicted בָבֶל֙ <WH894> va-Vel Babel כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> kas-Dim, of Chaldea אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land מוֹלַדְתָּֽם׃ <WH4138> mo-lad-Tam. of their nativity

וַתַּעְגַּב vat-ta'-gav כוַתַּעְגְּבָ֥ה <WH5689> vat-ta'-ge-Vah dote קעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem after לְמַרְאֵ֣ה <WH4758> le-mar-'Eh And as soon as she saw עֵינֶ֑יהָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-ha; them with her eyes וַתִּשְׁלַ֧ח <WH7971> vat-tish-Lach upon them and sent מַלְאָכִ֛ים <WH4397> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to כַּשְׂדִּֽימָה׃ <WH3778> kas-Di-mah. unto them into Chaldea

וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came אֵלֶ֤יהָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-ha about בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- afflicted בָבֶל֙ <WH894> va-Vel Babel לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH4904> le-mish-Kav to her into the bed דֹּדִ֔ים <WH1730> do-Dim, of love וַיְטַמְּא֥וּ <WH2930> vay-tam-me-'U and they defiled אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> o-Tah בְּתַזְנוּתָ֑ם <WH8457> be-taz-nu-Tam; her with their whoredom וַתִּ֨טְמָא־ <WH2930> vat-Tit-ma- and she was polluted בָ֔ם Vam, וַתֵּ֥קַע <WH3363> vat-Te-ka' was alienated נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> naf-Shah with them and her mind מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> me-Hem. like

וַתְּגַל֙ <WH1540> vat-te-Gal So she discovered תַּזְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <WH8457> taz-nu-Tei-ha, her whoredoms וַתְּגַ֖ל <WH1540> vat-te-Gal and discovered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֶרְוָתָ֑הּ <WH6172> 'er-va-Tah; her nakedness וַתֵּ֤קַע <WH3363> vat-Te-ka' was alienated נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> naf-Shi then my mind מֵֽעָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> me-'a-Lei-ha, and כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after נָקְעָ֥ה <WH5361> na-ke-'Ah was alienated נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> naf-Shi from her like as my mind מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> me-'Al with אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH269> a-cho-Tah. from her sister

וַתַּרְבֶּ֖ה <WH7235> vat-tar-Beh Yet she multiplied אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- תַּזְנוּתֶ֑יהָ <WH8457> taz-nu-Tei-ha; her whoredoms לִזְכֹּר֙ <WH2142> liz-Kor in calling to remembrance אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> ye-Mei the days נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <WH5271> ne-'u-Rei-ha, of her youth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher when זָנְתָ֖ה <WH2181> za-ne-Tah wherein she had played the harlot בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וַֽתַּעְגְּבָ֔ה <WH5689> vat-ta'-ge-Vah, For she doted עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al after פִּֽלַגְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <WH6370> pi-lag-shei-Hem; upon their paramours אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose בְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> be-sar- whose flesh חֲמוֹרִים֙ <WH2543> cha-mo-Rim of asses בְּשָׂרָ֔ם <WH1320> be-sa-Ram, [is as] the flesh וְזִרְמַ֥ת <WH2231> ve-zir-Mat and whose issue סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> su-Sim of horses זִרְמָתָֽם׃ <WH2231> zir-ma-Tam. [is like] the issue

וַֽתִּפְקְדִ֔י <WH6485> vat-tif-ke-Di, Thus thou calledst to remembrance אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et זִמַּ֣ת <WH2154> zim-Mat the lewdness נְעוּרָ֑יִךְ <WH5271> ne-'u-Ra-yich; of thy youth בַּעְשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> ba'-Sot in bruising מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim by the Egyptians דַּדַּ֔יִךְ <WH1717> dad-Da-yich, thy teats לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because שְׁדֵ֥י <WH7699> she-Dei for the paps נְעוּרָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5271> ne-'u-Ra-yich. of thy youth ס sa-Mek
